alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 2:15AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Vernon, northeastern Grant, Richland and northeastern Crawford Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 214 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of La Farge to 12 miles east of Harpers Ferry. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... La Farge around 220 AM CDT. Boscobel and Hillsboro around 235 AM CDT. Muscoda around 255 AM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
